forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 63. West wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. South wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston, the midday sun smiles upon the city, casting a warm glow against the backdrop of a deep blue sky. It's one of those crystalline afternoons where the world seems to breathe more freely, with the temperature hovering around a gentle 63 degrees. A whisper of a westward breeze completes the tableau, barely rustling the leaves. As evening approaches, the sky will remain mostly clear, and a quiet calm settles over the landscape, inviting thoughts of warmth and comfort, with nighttime dipping to a low of 45.

Dressed for this delightful interlude, a light sweater or a thin jacket would serve you well, perhaps layered over a comfortable shirt—enough to keep the evening chill at bay without burdening you during the day. This is a moment to revel in the pleasures of routine. A leisurely walk through the Boston Common may offer just the right soundtrack of crunching leaves underfoot, or perhaps a visit to one of the many quaint cafés—where inviting aromas mingle and weary souls refresh. Whatever your choice, take a moment to appreciate the embrace of a perfect autumn day in this timeless city.
